entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening and ending before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 24 April 2023
